Control Statement: The organization employs automated mechanisms to compare the results of vulnerability scans over time to determine trends in information system vulnerabilities.Supplemental Guidance:  Related controls: IR-4, IR-5, SI-4.

control_attributes.description: The organization employs automated mechanisms to compare the results of vulnerability scans over time to determine trends in information system vulnerabilities.Supplemental Guidance:  Related controls: IR-4, IR-5, SI-4.
control_attributes.AdditionalReq: RA-5 (6) Guidance: include in Continuous Monitoring ISSO digest/report to JAB/AO
